description: Prompts for each sector with cycling support. Each sector has an array of prompts that cycle on each generation. Sectors are named by row (T=top, M=middle, B=bottom) and column (L=left, C=center, R=right).
default: add a small detail, photorealistic, seamless blend
add something interesting, photorealistic, natural lighting
enhance with a subtle element, photorealistic

TL: add a small colorful bird perched in the corner, photorealistic, natural lighting
add a floating soap bubble, photorealistic, iridescent reflections
add a small paper airplane, photorealistic, slight motion blur
add a tiny bee hovering, photorealistic, detailed wings
TC: add fluffy white clouds, photorealistic, soft lighting
add a rainbow arc, photorealistic, subtle colors
add a hot air balloon in the distance, photorealistic, miniature scale
add morning sun rays breaking through, photorealistic, golden light
TR: add a monarch butterfly, photorealistic, delicate wing details
add a small kite flying, photorealistic, colorful
add a dragonfly hovering, photorealistic, translucent wings
add a hummingbird in flight, photorealistic, motion blur on wings
ML: add green ivy leaves growing, photorealistic, natural colors
add a small potted succulent, photorealistic, detailed texture
add wildflowers blooming, photorealistic, vibrant colors
add a small fern frond, photorealistic, delicate leaves
MC: add another piece of fruit, photorealistic, same style as existing
slightly change the color saturation of the central object
add a subtle reflection or highlight, photorealistic
add a second similar object nearby, photorealistic, matching style
MR: add a small daisy flower, photorealistic, white petals yellow center
add a red poppy flower, photorealistic, delicate petals
add a purple orchid, photorealistic, elegant
add a small sunflower, photorealistic, bright yellow
BL: add fallen autumn leaves, photorealistic, warm colors
add small pebbles scattered, photorealistic, natural arrangement
add a tiny mushroom, photorealistic, forest floor style
add dewdrops on the surface, photorealistic, reflective
BC: add a subtle shadow underneath, photorealistic, soft edges
add a small puddle reflection, photorealistic, mirror-like
add scattered flower petals, photorealistic, soft colors
add a faint texture pattern, photorealistic, subtle
BR: add a small ladybug, photorealistic, red with black spots
add a tiny snail, photorealistic, spiral shell
add a colorful caterpillar, photorealistic, fuzzy texture
add a small grasshopper, photorealistic, green, detailed legs
